description.narrative: By 2025, the education system has increased capacity to offer inclusive and quality education (including primary) for the most vulnerable children, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, more young children, especially the most vulnerable, benefit from learning, nurturing, care and development at home and in their communities.
